thread.title: Soft, Sticky Frog Tongues Slurp Supper

author: Lydia Chain
title: Soft, Sticky Frog Tongues Slurp Supper
text:
Soft, Sticky Frog Tongues Slurp Supper By Lydia Chain on January 31, 2017 Share on Facebook Print Share via 
Scientists discovered a frog’s ability to nab an insect in a fraction of a second depends on the fluid mechanics of its spit.
